SELECT A.USER_NO , A.EMP_SERIAL , A.USER_NM , A.BIRTH_DT , A.GENDER_YN , B.DEPT_NM , C.JOB_NM , A.LINE_NO , A.PHONE_NO , A.ADDRESS , A.HIREDATE , A.INPUT_DT , A.ADMIN_YN , A.MANAGE_YN FROM T_EDU_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_EDU_DEPT B ON (A.DEPT_NO = B.DEPT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN T_EDU_JOB C ON (A.JOB_NO = C.JOB_NO) WHERE 1=1
